thread.title: How PM Narendra Modi`s pick for UP CM, Yogi Adityanath, unnerved Pakistan – Watch Report
thread.title_full: How PM Narendra Modi`s pick for UP CM, Yogi Adityanath, unnerved Pakistan – Watch Report

author: Zee Media Bureau
title: How PM Narendra Modi`s pick for UP CM, Yogi Adityanath, unnerved Pakistan – Watch Report
text:
How PM Narendra Modi's pick for UP CM, Yogi Adityanath, unnerved Pakistan – Watch Report By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Wednesday, March 22, 2017 - 09:24 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: ` Desh mein Modi, Pradesh mein Yogi ` slogan has unnerved the Pakistani media. 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi's decision to appoint Yogi Adityanath as Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister has shocked the neighbouring country. 
Moreover, the Pakistani media is flushed with statements trying to defame Yogi Adityanath. MUST READ 
Watch the reaction of the Pakistani media: First Published: Wednesday, March 22, 2017 - 08:55 More from zeenews
